description:
As a UI developer
  I want to create and manage groups of interactive buttons
  So that I can build consistent user interfaces efficiently

elements.name: Creating a vertical button group with custom positioning

steps.name: I have a button group configuration system
I have an action factory for button behaviors
I have a clean localStorage state
I have a vertical layout configuration with 3 buttons
I set the position to top-left with padding
I create the button group
the buttons should be arranged vertically
the group should be positioned at the top-left corner
the padding should create proper spacing around the buttons

name: Universal Button Group System

description:
As a UI developer
  I want a central manager to orchestrate multiple button groups
  So that I can efficiently manage complex UI layouts with JSON configuration

steps.name: I have a button group manager system
I have clean localStorage state
I have a mock canvas environment
I have a JSON configuration with 3 button groups
I create a button group manager with the configuration
the manager should successfully initialize
all 3 button groups should be created and active
each button group should have its configured layout and buttons
the manager should track all active groups by ID

elements.name: Loading button groups from configuration file

steps.name: I have a button group manager system
I have clean localStorage state
I have a mock canvas environment
I have a JSON configuration file "ui-config.json" with multiple groups
I load the configuration file into the manager
the manager should parse the JSON successfully
create button groups for each configuration entry
handle any configuration validation errors gracefully
report successful and failed group creations
I have a button group manager system
I have clean localStorage state
I have a mock canvas environment
I have a manager with 4 active button groups
I request all active groups
I should receive all 4 group instances
each group should be properly initialized and functional
I request a specific group by ID "toolbar-main"
I should receive the correct button group instance

steps.name: the group should be ready for interaction
I have a button group manager system
I have clean localStorage state
I have a mock canvas environment
I have a manager with 2 active button groups
I add a new button group configuration dynamically
the new group should be created and added to active groups
the existing groups should remain unaffected
I remove a button group by ID "temp-group"
the group should be removed from active groups
its resources should be cleaned up properly

elements.name: Updating button group configurations at runtime

steps.name: I have a button group manager system
I have clean localStorage state
I have a mock canvas environment
I have a manager with a button group "settings-panel"
I update the group's transparency to 0.7
I update the group's position to (300, 400)
the manager should apply changes to the target group
the group should reflect the new transparency and position
other groups should remain unchanged
I have a button group manager system
I have clean localStorage state
I have a mock canvas environment
I have a manager with 3 overlapping button groups
I provide mouse coordinates (250, 300) with click state true
the manager should determine which groups can handle the interaction
forward the interaction to all eligible groups
return interaction results for each group
handle the case where no groups are at those coordinates
I have a button group manager system
I have clean localStorage state
I have a mock canvas environment
I have a manager with 5 button groups of varying visibility
I request the manager to render all groups
only visible groups should be rendered
groups should be rendered in the correct depth order
each group's render method should be called with proper context
rendering should handle groups with different scales and transparency
I have a button group manager system
I have clean localStorage state
I have a mock canvas environment
I have a JSON configuration with invalid group definitions
I attempt to create a manager with the invalid configuration
the manager should identify and report configuration errors
create groups only for valid configurations
provide detailed error messages for debugging
continue operating with successfully created groups
I have a button group manager system
I have clean localStorage state
I have a mock canvas environment
I have a manager with 3 groups that have persistence enabled
I trigger a global save operation
all groups with persistence should save their current state
the manager should coordinate the save operations
report successful and failed save operations
I trigger a global load operation
all groups should restore their persisted state
handle missing or corrupted persistence data gracefully
I have a button group manager system
I have clean localStorage state
I have a mock canvas environment
I have a manager with 20 button groups
I perform mouse interaction testing
the manager should use efficient hit-testing algorithms
avoid unnecessary processing for groups outside interaction area
maintain responsive performance during interaction
I perform rendering operations
the manager should optimize rendering calls
skip rendering for groups outside viewport if culling is enabled
I have a button group manager system
I have clean localStorage state
I have a mock canvas environment
I have a manager with groups containing various button actions
a button action is triggered in group "main-toolbar"
the manager should coordinate with the action factory
execute the requested action through proper channels
handle action execution errors gracefully
provide feedback about action success or failure
I have a button group manager system
I have clean localStorage state
I have a mock canvas environment
I have a manager with a button group "dynamic-panel" for reconfiguration
I reconfigure the group to change from horizontal to vertical layout
modify the button configurations within the group
the manager should apply the layout change
recreate buttons according to new configuration
maintain group state like position and visibility
preserve any persisted settings that remain valid
I have a button group manager system
I have clean localStorage state
I have a mock canvas environment
I have a manager with multiple active groups
I request manager diagnostic information
I should receive comprehensive state information
active group count, IDs, and status for each group
performance metrics if available
current configuration summary
any active error conditions or warnings
I have a button group manager system
I have clean localStorage state
I have a mock canvas environment
I have a manager with overlapping button groups
some groups are invisible or have low transparency
I request interaction handling for mouse position (400, 200)
the manager should only consider visible and interactive groups
respect group transparency levels for interaction priority
handle z-order for overlapping interactive regions
provide clear feedback about which group handled the interaction
I have a button group manager system
I have clean localStorage state
I have a mock canvas environment
I have a manager with 6 active button groups for cleanup testing
I request complete manager shutdown
all button groups should be properly disposed
event listeners should be cleaned up
persistence operations should be completed
memory resources should be released
the manager should be ready for safe garbage collection

name: Button Group Manager - Universal Button System Controller

description:
As a game developer  
  I want entities to be automatically collected and rendered by the system
  So that I don't have to manually manage entity rendering

steps.name: I have an entity renderer
I have a mock entity system
I create a new entity with type "ant"
I assign a sprite with image "ant.png" at position (100, 150)
I set the render layer to "ANTS"
the entity should be discoverable by the renderer
the entity should render when the "ANTS" layer is processed
the sprite render method should be called
I have an entity renderer
I have a mock entity system
I create a new entity with type "resource"
I assign a sprite with image "leaf.png" at position (200, 250)
I set the render layer to "RESOURCES"
the entity should be discoverable by the renderer
the entity should render when the "RESOURCES" layer is processed
I have an entity renderer
I have a mock entity system
I create a new entity with type "ant"
I assign a sprite with image "ant.png" at position (100, 150)
I set the render layer to "ANTS"
I set the entity to inactive
the entity should not be discoverable by the renderer
the sprite render method should not be called
I have an entity renderer
I have a mock entity system
I create a new entity with type "ant"
I assign a sprite with image "ant.png" at position (-100, -100)
I set the render layer to "ANTS"
frustum culling is enabled
the entity should not be discoverable by the renderer
the sprite render method should not be called

name: Entity Lifecycle Management

description:
As a game developer
  I want the rendering system to show appropriate layers based on game state
  So that users see the right interface elements for each game mode

steps.name: I have a render layer manager
I have mocked all global dependencies
the render manager is initialized
I have layer renderers that track call order
the game is in "PLAYING" state
I request the rendering system to render
the "TERRAIN,ENTITIES,UI_GAME,UI_DEBUG" layers should be rendered
the "UI_MENU" layers should not be rendered
the "TERRAIN" layer should render before "ENTITIES"
the "ENTITIES" layer should render before "UI_GAME"
I have a render layer manager
I have mocked all global dependencies
the render manager is initialized
I have layer renderers that track call order
the game is in "MENU" state
I request the rendering system to render
the "TERRAIN,UI_MENU" layers should be rendered
the "ENTITIES,UI_GAME,UI_DEBUG" layers should not be rendered
I have a render layer manager
I have mocked all global dependencies
the render manager is initialized
I have layer renderers that track call order
the game is in "PAUSED" state
I request the rendering system to render
the "TERRAIN,ENTITIES,UI_GAME" layers should be rendered
the "UI_DEBUG,UI_MENU" layers should not be rendered
I have a render layer manager
I have mocked all global dependencies
the render manager is initialized
I have layer renderers that track call order
the game is in "DEBUG_MENU" state
I request the rendering system to render
the "TERRAIN,ENTITIES,UI_DEBUG,UI_MENU" layers should be rendered
the "UI_GAME" layers should not be rendered

name: Game State Rendering
